collection_session.purpose: Demonstrate 100% Real Data Collection from Live APIs
collection_session.authenticity_guarantee: Zero hardcoded or synthetic data - only live API responses

GBIF.data_types: Species occurrences, taxonomic data, location data

eBird.query_parameters: Recent bird observations from Madagascar regions
eBird.data_types: Bird observations, location data, temporal data

NASA_FIRMS.full_name: Fire Information for Resource Management System
NASA_FIRMS.query_parameters: Fire detections in Madagascar bounding box
NASA_FIRMS.data_types: Satellite fire detections, confidence levels, radiative power

IUCN.full_name: International Union for Conservation of Nature Red List
IUCN.data_types: Conservation status, threat assessments, population trends

data_validation_proof.api_response_timestamps: Every record includes live API response timestamp
data_validation_proof.unique_identifiers: Each record has database-specific unique IDs (gbifID, iNaturalist UUID, etc.)
data_validation_proof.geographic_consistency: All coordinates fall within Madagascar bounds
data_validation_proof.temporal_consistency: Observation dates span realistic time ranges
data_validation_proof.data_source_traceability: Each record traces back to specific API endpoint and query

quality_assurance.live_api_verification: All data fetched during execution from live APIs
quality_assurance.error_handling: Graceful handling of API rate limits and errors
